name: biceps-curl-with-machine
title: Biceps Curl: Machine
primer: This exercise uses a machine to insure proper form.
steps: Adjust the seat of the machine so your elbows are correctly aligned with the rotation axis.
Press your arms against the pads and keep them stationary throughout the exercise.
Curl your forearms until your arms are fully flexed.
Slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.
